item.description:
The stars of Mystery Science Theater 3000 are coming back to select movie theaters nationwide for only one night to take on a film that's so bad it's hilarious: Birdemic. Join Michael J. Nelson, Kevin Murphy and Bill Corbett of RiffTrax.com on Thursday, October 25th for hilarious riffing on a not-so-classic movie! This one night event will be your only chance to see the guys fire their wisecracking commentary at Birdemic on the big screen.

Tickets are available online and cost $13.75 each (includes inconvenience fee). BUY YOUR TICKET IN ADVANCE - THIS WILL SELL OUT

event details: http://www.fathomevents.com/originals/event/birdemic.aspx
item.name: Rifftrax Live: Birdemic
